oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-02-18 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 18, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Don Slayman, Lew Childre, Moon Mullican, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan; Rod Brasfield; Louvin Brothers; Lew Childre; Don Slayman
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces George Morgan -- Won't You Ride In My Little Red Wagon (George Morgan) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces the Louvin Brothers -- I Don't Believe You've Met My Baby (Louvin Brothers) -- George Morgan introduces Lew Childre and Don Slayman -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Lew Childre calls, Don Slayman fiddle) -- George Morgan talks -- Nearer, My God, To Thee (George Morgan, Louvin Brothers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- Prince Albert jingle (George Morgan)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Hay, George D. (George Dewey), 1895-1968; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Mullican, Moon, 1909-1967; Slayman, Don (Musician); Davis, Don, 1928 December 22-; Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Louvin Brothers; Louvin, Ira, 1924-1965; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011
